column5: The cottage sits on a sizable lake less than 15 miles away from Canton's First Monday Trade Days. Cottage complete with fully furnished kitchen, outdoor grill & patio, fire pit & hammock. All linens & bath necessities included; shower &small vanity with sink. Queen-sized bed that sleeps two most comfortably. Futon that can accommodate sleeping arrangements as well. Tiki-torches & citronella candles available. Complimentary coffee. Soft drinks & water available for a small fee. No pet policy.
